metadata.description:
kAz has travelled a lot in the netausioscene and made releases on tonatom, acedia music and thinner. now he reached 2063music. kAz dedicates his music to the netaudio-spirit: free music for free minds in an environment of constant change. a global range of listers and he believes, that the future of music is netaudio.
after some experiences in gutar bands he began djing in 1990 till he found out, that producing music himself give a lot of more freedom and expression.
sparse rotation just fits perfectly into hot summer nights. it's about the exploration of inner and outer scapes while moving around. kAz music seems to be influenced by a variety of sound between detroit techno, minimalims beats and laid back click scapes. this lp is a stange mixture of late 90ies techno and current netaudio, mixed with warm emotion of summer, love and architectonical impression.
metadata.title: kAz - sparse rotation [63LP002]
metadata.subject: Minimal Techno;Minimal-Dub
